title: The e-Resilience of British Retail Centres
abstractText:
This project explores patterns of retail e-Resilience in terms of the extent to which retail centres are exposed to consumers who are heavily engaged with information and communication technologies, and the virtual retail channels that these enable.

This project seeks to ascertain how e-Resilience may be quantifiably measured and generalised, and to develop a methodological framework through which the constituent multiple dimensions can be collected and compiled into usable indicators for use by academic and retailer stakeholders.
